entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 a.m. NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
